name: giantants
text: It sounds like a sweet show kind of and why then is Pat of all people watcing it?

name: achilleselbow
text: Kind of? I would totally watch it. The names could use some work though - I'm not at all sure that Cymuion sounds at all medieval. Sounds more like some kind of foreign soup.

name: hatstand_mcq
text: I imagine Trials of Honour to be like the Barchester Chronicles only with the ever present possibility of somone cutting off someone else's head. That show would appeal to me.

name: fattypneumonia
text: Cymulon sounds like a tertiary character from "All My Circuits."

name: engus
text: Futurama chubby,  I just found out comedy central made a deal for 2 new seasons

name: bhlaab
text: Actually that is a show that assholes watch and it is proven.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Pete don't care. He is so friendy. Notice he says TEEvee like it's supposed to be said in Appalachia.

name: radishes
text: A comment left by radishes was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by KilroyWasHere, mrpedro, chuwie)

name: halfdirt
text: Panels four and seven

name: straw
text: Panels three and five.

name: tekende
text: Panels one and nine.

name: ford
text: I really gotta go with eight and ten.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i'll say fourteen, Stan!

name: shutup_shutup
text: SOLD.

name: cagliostro
text: That's Panelwang!

name: rosie
text: Part of the reason why I love Pat's assholishness so much is because he gets worked up over the craziest stuff.

name: epicurus
text: I love picturing that falcon alighting on the handshake. Would the knights be cool with that? Personally I would consider freaking out a bit. It had got to be awkward, a falcon all flying onto your damn arm. I imagine that you and the other guy share an embarassed look.

name: clembot
text: are you kidding me? the falcon represents strength and honor, and the knights know that.

name: epicurus
text: Well, I think a Lion represents strength and honor, but if one jumped out from behind the couch every time I met someone's dad I would not be totally prepared.

name: petitegitan
text: The knights are like, "Is this your falcon?  "Mine?  no..."  "Well, one of us has to take it home."

name: spinynorman
text: falcons are sort of a pain

name: choosebro
text: Hey, falcons were worth a heap of money back in the day. A Falconer could very well lose his head if he lost one of his falcons.

name: heccibiggs
text: Shit, this ten-month-old thread is just full of gold .

name: gouldgonewild
text: Agreed

name: cpnglxynchos
text: the most awkward game of rock-paper-scissors ever.

name: cathaoir
text: Sorry! I meant to chubby you - not lame you!

name: jimmyk
text: I just had to sign up to give this comment my first ever chubby and reply. Now, every time I meet someone's father, I will keep a fearful eye on the nearest couch.

name: saint
text: try what I did. only $10k up front.

name: pyro_ike
text: Of course they would.  Falcons only alight on good, dealcloser handshakes.

name: soticoto
text: Because good, dealcloser handshakes look like plump, delicious rabbits.

name: jonmw
text: I think that a good, dealcloser handshake looks like two fleshy amputee spiders bumping uglies

name: deancain29
text: last panel - great artwork

name: deusoma
text: I have a sneaking suspicion it's modified clipart.

name: stormagnet
text: Or a blown-up clip from some Prince Valiant strip.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: GET OUT OF HERE WITH THAT..THAT [B] SHIT [B]!

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i done it up in lights this time.

sorry.

what was i thinking.

we cool?

name: jesler729
text:
Pat refers to the show as "intelligent".

Pat is a dick.

name: grombly
text: it MUST be intelligent if pat is watching it

name: kingcrimson
text: "Such intelligent programming" is one of the biggest dick lines there is

name: hellofyellin
text: Onstad, please contact me for handshake lessons. I'll give you hands like a blacksmith .

name: saru
text: Like... Hiram, the Blacksmith?

name: hellofyellin
text: No.

name: paco
text:
I am a blacksmith.

not kidding.

name: woodenteeth
text: When shaking hands with other blacksmiths do your hands look like plump delicious amputee rabbitspiders making love?

name: jackparsons
text: Nooooooo... Onstad is local (San Francisco bay area)

name: cpnglxynchos
text: does that warrant a 'nooooooo'?

name: yossarianlives
text:
3.9 is a crime against humanity.

Last line made me wet myself.

name: sigmacoder
text: The Manshake: When two men shake hands on a mountaintop, a falcon alights on their grip while lightning flashes in the background.

name: woodenteeth
text: or a concoction that happens when Nice Pete and a blender are in a room for too long together.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Here are some of their Hands!

name: rhadamanthus
text: Ha, never noticed that the channel's callsign is KQED.

name: edwell
text: KQED is an actual PBS affiliate in California. The choice of callsign was deliberate , too.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: that's a rad article! the soundproofing secret especially.

name: arelladawn
text: Yes sir

name: drskradley
text: Well Mr Onstad, I'd pay almost fifty bucks to have a good falcon alight on my hand during a good, dealcloser handshake.

name: tekende
text: How much would you pay for a bad falcon to do the same?

name: woodenteeth
text: Tekende's rearing program was not altogether a success.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: we know this

name: fineoakstructure
text: It took me a few seconds to make sure I understood this, but this is a damn good comment.

name: woodenteeth
text: One of my favourites. Underappreciated. Look at the genius - blah blah blah...

name: cormanosanchez
text: those are some seriously well rendered hands.

name: deovalente
text: Pat is the kind of guy who would feel the need to state that it is a falcon , thank you very much.

name: bumfighter
text: Fucking Pat and his fucking teevee shows.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i..don't really see any fucking going on, there.

name: direhaggis
text: Panel 6: a thumb ring makes for stone cold handshakes such as gripping fast tight.

name: greenkoolayd
text: a thumb ring is the manliest of hand jewelry choices for a man.

name: woodenteeth
text: greenkoolayd and his friends have this argument all the time.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i state facts.  those that argue are wrong.  i am male accessory fashion judge, male accessory fashion jury, and male accessory fashion executioner.

name: woodenteeth
text: I hesitate to ask how you execute on Prince Alfreds.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i dont know who they are......

name: woodenteeth
text: Please don't Googe Image "Prince Alfred" then.

name: aelindil
text: I have to second this.  It is a Mistake.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i thought that was called a prince albert...

name: woodenteeth
text: It... It is. Wow. OK. You know what... this whole thing hasn't gone so well and I was hoping we could just delete the entire thread. Oh... wait.

name: greenkoolayd
text: naw, its cool.  normally, im the one in your place.  thanks for giving me a different perspective.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: w'all gotta admit, gives new perspective to Prince Albert in a can...

name: greenkoolayd
text: yikes.  picture a disposable, one-use piercing gun.......

name: scorpio_nadir
text: So, Manshake, guys?

name: woodenteeth
text:
*raaaaaarrrk, raaaaaaarrrk*

Sounds like it, yeah. Although I still have talon scars...

name: quaga
text: I would totally watch this show, even if it's the sort of thing Pat likes

name: achilleselbow
text: I think we might soon get something very similar, if the gods be good .

name: quaga
text: Damn it, TV needs to stop giving me excellent reasons to not leave the house! I am fat enough.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Hilarious titles!

A Game of THRONES
A Clash of KINGS
A Storm of SWORDS
A Feast for CROWS
A Dance with DRAGONS

Brilliant.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Give the Wheel of Time series a try.

(Except don't. Unless you like your mentions of medieval female underwear fast and frequent.

Also bondage, occasionally.)

name: sp1derbaby
text: Who wouldn't like their mentions of medieval female underwear fast and frequent? It is such intelligent programming.

name: rowboat
text: The more mentions of medieval female underwear I hear, the faster and more frequent I get.

name: tekende
text:
A Tryst with LADIES
A Lay with DUDES

name: sp1derbaby
text:
A tangle of TRANNIES.
A fete of FURRIES.

name: cagliostro
text:
Man. I once spent several centuries stuck in a pub listening to the bloke at the next table pitching his ideas for a proposed trilogy of high fantasy novels to his hapless female companion. He was planning to call it 'Dragon Sword, Raven Crown'.

I think, had I beaten him to death with his Magners bottle, I would automatically have been in the running for at least two major literary awards.

name: tekende
text: Unfortunately, that title would probably be completely acceptable to most fantasy publishers.

name: woodenteeth
text: I imagine an alternative universe where a highly regarded literary publisher asks that their authors murder at least one (1) terrible popular fiction writer for credibility's/dedication's sake.

name: scifigrl47
text: The lady in question might've bought you a drink if you had.

name: arelladawn
text: Man I grew up watching KQED but all I remember is like Reading Rainbow, etc.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: LeVar (is that seriously his name?? i thought it was Lamar..why'd they even change his name in The Next Generation...seriously--) was super cool. i don't care what anybody says.

name: nickb285
text:
I'm glad that Onstad recognizes the importance of a good handshake. A handshake tells you a lot about a dude. Last guy I met with a good handshake? A stand-up fellow who owns a slightly divey Irish pub. Last guy I met with a crappy handshake? Got arrested a month later for kiddie porn.

Both of these are true.
